welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Daventry, known for its rich history and picturesque countryside. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the beauty and delights this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Northampton Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport, mainly used for international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
